<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Assigns the user column, if possible, using the same logic as the "Recalculate audience" scheduled job.</description>
        <name>Assign user column for existing H&S reqs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var hsuUtil = new HealthAndSafetyUserUtil();

new global.GlideQuery('sn_imt_core_health_and_safety_requirement')
    .whereNull('user_column')
    .where('requirement_for', 'employee')
    .select('table')
    .forEach(function (requirement) {
        var column = hsuUtil.getUserFieldName(requirement.table);
        if (column) {
            try {
            new global.GlideQuery('sn_imt_core_health_and_safety_requirement')
                .where('sys_id', requirement.sys_id)
                .update({
                    user_column: column
                });
            } catch (e) {
                gs.error('Fix script: Could not update requirement user column: ' + e.message);
            }
        }
    });

]]></script>
